sentences.english: In turn, a thin drunk sleep the chill heavy.
sentences.chinese: 薄醉不成鄉，轉覺春寒重。

sentences.english: Our factory is located in the "hardware village, " said Sands, Nanhai District, Foshan City.
sentences.chinese: 本廠位於有“五金之鄉”之稱的佛山市南海區金沙。

sentences.english: Many people deserted their homes during the food shortage.
sentences.chinese: 許多人在饑荒中逃往他鄉。

sentences.english: Tongbai pumped storage power station is located in Xixia township of Tiantai county, Zhejiang province.
sentences.chinese: 桐柏抽水蓄能電站位於浙江省天台縣棲霞鄉。

sentences.english: Guangning is the home of bamboo and famous for its picturesque scenery .
sentences.chinese: 廣寧是著名的竹子之鄉，以優美的自然景色而出名。

sentences.english: bernard's art class took a trip to the country to learn how to paint landscapes.
sentences.chinese: 伯納德到鄉下去上美術課，學習如何畫風景畫。

sentences.english: Lincang is the world famous "Dianhong" village.
sentences.chinese: 臨滄是世界著名的“滇紅”之鄉。

sentences.english: The children is evacuate to the country when the city is is bombe.
sentences.chinese: 轟炸時，兒童都疏散到鄉下去了。

sentences.english: Siyang County of Jiangsu Province is a famous town of Italy-Poplar in China.
sentences.chinese: 江蘇省泗陽縣是中國著名的意楊之鄉。

sentences.english: Food Machinery Co. , Ltd. Zibo Kwong building located in the famous Huantai.
sentences.chinese: 淄博廣安食品機械有限公司坐落在著名建築之鄉桓臺。

sentences.english: The company is located in Changle city of Fuzhou, Fujian Province, the renowned "Textile City".
sentences.chinese: 公司坐落在有“紡織之鄉”美稱的福州長樂市。

sentences.english: Hsiang didn't expect the magnitude of the effect to be so large.
sentences.chinese: 鄉，沒想到效果的幅度如此之大。

sentences.english: The ramps in the opposite tablets Menuhin is Shuiyun Township.
sentences.chinese: 在聽濤軒的斜對面就是水雲鄉。

sentences.english: Zhangzhou enjoys a reputation of "A Land of Flowers and Fruits".
sentences.chinese: 漳州素有“花果之鄉”的美譽。

sentences.english: Heze is quite famous for its peony flowers . It is the home of peony.
sentences.chinese: 菏澤以牡丹花聞名，它是牡丹之鄉。

sentences.english: The second part describes the phonetic systems of Qianxiang and Houxiang.
sentences.chinese: 第二章描述了前鄉話和後鄉話的語音系統。
